특화 신성 능력

SALIENT DIVINE ABILITIES

A salient 신성 ability is like a feat—it gives a deity a new capability or improves one that the deity already has. A deity has one salient 신성 ability for each 신성 rank the deity has, plus additional 특화 신성 능력 reflecting its 상태확인: Demigods receive one 보너스 ability, 하급 deities receive two 보너스 능력, intermediate deities receive three, and 상급 deities receive five.

Some 특화 신성 능력 have 전제조건. Usually, the deity must have all the listed 전제조건 to have the ability. A 신성 rank of 1 is a prerequisite for all 특화 신성 능력. The most common 특화 신성 능력 are described here. A few deities have unique 특화 신성 능력 that are described in the deity의 individual entry.

Using 특화 신성 능력: Using a salient 신성 ability is a standard action unless otherwise noted in the ability 묘사. Using a salient 신성 ability does not provoke an 공격 of opportunity.

특화 신성 능력 and 항마: A salient 신성 ability functions normally within an 대마법 보호장, and is never subject to 주문 저항.

특화 신성 능력 설명

Salient Divine Ability Descriptions

Here is the format for 특화 신성 능력 설명.

능력 이름

Ability Name

전제조건: A minimum 신성 rank, minimum ability score, another salient 신성 ability, a minimum 기본 공격 보너스, a feat, a skill, or some other condition that a deity must have in order to acquire this salient 신성 ability. This entry is absent if a salient 신성 ability has no prerequisite. An ability may have more than one prerequisite. All 특화 신성 능력 have a minimum prerequisite of 신성 rank 1. Quasi-deities (rank 0) have no 특화 신성 능력.

이익: What the ability enables the deity to do. If a deity has the same ability more than once, its benefits do not stack unless indicated otherwise in 묘사. In general, having a salient 신성 ability twice is the same as having it once.

Notes: Additional facts about the ability that may be helpful when using the ability in play.

Rest: Some 능력 require the deity to rest afterward. If no rest is required, the entry is absent. A resting deity can engage in 빛 activities such as talking or walking at half 속도. When attempting anything more strenuous than that, the deity can only take partial actions and suffers a –6 페널티 on all 명중 굴림, 내성 굴림, and checks. The deity cannot use another ability that requires rest until its current rest requirement is fulfilled. Any time the deity spends performing strenuous activities does not count toward the required rest time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: This entry gives one or more portfolio elements that are associated with the salient 신성 ability in question. The information is provided as 길라잡이 and should not be taken as a rule.

형태 변경

Alter Form

This is an extraordinary ability.

전제조건: 크기 변경 salient 신성 ability.

이익: As a 이동-equivalent action, the deity can alter its form, including 의류 and 장비. The assumed form must be corporeal. The deity의 body can undergo a limited physical 변환술, including adding or subtracting one or two limbs. If the form selected has wings, the deity can 비행. Likewise, the deity can 수영 if the form has fins, breathe water if the form has gills, and so on.

The deity can remain in the altered form indefinitely, but resumes its own form if slain.

Notes: The deity의 공격 보너스, 방어도, and 내성 굴림 do not change. The deity does not gain any of the assumed form의 특수 능력, 공격 forms, defenses, 능력 점수, or mannerisms. The deity can change physical qualities (such as hair color, hair

texture, skin color, and gender). The deity can use this ability to create 변장, gaining 보너스 of +10 on its 변장 checks. The deity can use its 크기 변경 ability simultaneously along with this one to become taller, shorter, thinner, or heavier.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Nature, secrets, thieves.

현실 변경

Alter Reality

전제조건: Cha 29.

이익: This ability is similar to the 소원 spell. The deity merely thinks of something and then makes it so. Doing this requires at least a standard action.

Notes: The deity can duplicate any spell of 9th 레벨 or lower as a standard action. The duplicated spell has no material or XP component, and the DC of its 내성 굴림(if one is allowed) is 20 + the deity의 rank + the deity의 매력 수정치.

The deity also can duplicate a spell with any 메타마법 feat (so long as 메타마법 feat is available to characters of 20th 레벨 or lower). This use of the ability requires the deity to rest for 1 round for each 레벨 that the feat would normally add to the spell. It still takes a standard action to use this ability, so there is no point in using the ability to duplicate a quickened spell.

The deity can render a magical or supernatural effect permanent. The rest requirement varies with the effect: 10 minutes per 레벨 of the effect times the number of subjects affected, 10 minutes per total 히트 다이스 of creatures affected, or 10 minutes per 10-foot cube affected. Use the highest applicable value.

The deity can create temporary, nonmagical objects. This works like 물체 생성 ability (including the required rest period), except that the items last one day per rank.

The deity also can create permanent nonmagical objects as if using 물체 생성 ability except that all rest 필요조건 are doubled and there is no reduction in rest time for being on an Outer Plane or in the deity의 own realm.

The deity can create temporary 마법 아이템 or creatures. This works like 신성 제작 ability (including the required rest period), except that the items or creatures created last 1 hour per rank. This ability cannot create permanent 마법 아이템 or creatures.

The deity can reshape a landscape, creating any type of terrain the deity can imagine. Each 10-foot cube of material to be reshaped requires 1 round of effort, and the deity must rest for one day per 10-foot cube shaped after the work is completed.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

크기 변경

Alter Size

이익: As a free action, the deity can assume any size from Fine to Colossal. The deity also can change the size of up to 100 pounds of objects it touches. If the deity has a familiar, personal 탈것, or personal intelligent weapon, the creature can change size with the deity if the deity touches it, but its weight counts against the deity의 weight limit. This is a supernatural ability.

Notes: This ability allows the deity to assume any proportions from the size of a grain of sand up or as much as 1,600 feet tall. A radical change in size can have great impact on the deity의 전투 ability. The deity의 근력, 방어도, 공격 보너스, and 피해 dealt with 무기 changes according to the size the deity assumes. The deity의 근력

score can never be reduced to less than 1 through this ability. Also note that use of this 신성 ability does not affect all the deities’ characteristics.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

섬멸 타격

Annihilating Strike

전제조건: 신성 rank 11, 기본 공격 보너스 +20, Str 25.

이익: When the deity strikes with a weapon or natural weapon, the opponent struck might be obliterated. Creatures, attended objects, and 마법 아이템 must make Fortitude 내성 굴림(DC 20 + the deity의 rank + 피해 dealt) or be reduced to –10 히트 포인트 and killed outright. Unattended, nonmagical objects are obliterated. The deity can destroy up to 1,000 cubic feet (a 10-foot cube) of nonliving matter per rank, so the ability destroys only part of any very large object or structure targeted.

Notes: Deities with a rank equal to or 상급 than the attacking deity are not subject to this ability. This ability has no effect on objects or effects that are not subject to physical 공격.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Death, justice, vengeance, war.

비전 마스터

Arcane Mastery

전제조건: Spellcaster 레벨 1st, Int 29, 주문 마스터.

이익: The deity can prepare any 마법사 spell that it can cast without using a 주문책.

Notes: This ability gives the deity access to every spell on 소서러/마법사 spell list, provided that the deity has sufficient 마법사 레벨 and a sufficient 지능 score to cast them. The deity also can invent new 소서러/마법사 주문 without researching them.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 지식, magic.

광역 신성 방패

Area Divine Shield

전제조건: 신성 rank 6, Cha 29, 신성 방패 salient 신성 ability.

이익: Except where noted here, this ability works like 신성 방패 ability. The deity produces a transparent barrier whose 범위 is up to one 10-foot square per rank, or a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 1 foot per rank. The barrier can be placed anywhere within the deity의 line of sight. The deity can place the barrier so that it is mobile with respect to some unattended object or willing creature. The barrier can be adjusted to ignore certain types of 피해, just as a 신성 방패 can. If the deity makes 방패 mobile with respect to a willing creature, the deity also can make the barrier

one-way with respect to the creature and its allies, allowing them to 공격 through 방패 and still use its protection.

Notes: The deity can shape 방패 around itself or around a willing creature so that it is skintight, which prevents the subject from being touched.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Mercy, protection.

자동 메타마법

Automatic Metamagic

전제조건: Spellcaster 레벨 1st.

이익: The deity chooses one 메타마법 feat. As a free action, the deity can apply the selected feat to 주문 from any one spellcasting class the deity has or to its 유사주문 능력. A spell altered by the use of this ability does not use up a higher-레벨 slot.

Notes: The deity must obey all the limitations normally associated with 메타마법 feat. Any 메타마법 feat selected cannot have a 레벨 requirement of 21st or higher. 특기 that depend on making the spell의 레벨 higher, such as 주문 레벨 강화, do not work with this ability. A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a 메타마법 feat and either a spellcasting class or 유사주문 능력 to which the ability will apply each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 지식, magic.

화신

Avatar

전제조건: 신성 rank 6, Cha 29.

이익: An 화신 serves as a deity의 alter ego, effectively allowing the deity to be in two or more places at the same time. An 화신 is an extension of a deity. The deity senses and knows everything 화신 senses and knows and vice versa. Each 화신 counts as a remote location where the deity is sensing and communicating. A 하급 deity can have up to five 화신 at once, an intermediate deity can have up to ten, and a 상급 deity can have up to twenty 화신 at once. It takes a deity one year to create an 화신 or replace a destroyed 화신. The process does not require any special effort on the deity’s

part. An 화신 must be created in the deity의 own realm. If the deity has 신성 제작 salient 신성 ability, the deity can use it to create a new 화신 anywhere. However, the deity must rest afterward as noted in the 신성 제작 ability 묘사. An 화신 is a less powerful version of a deity, created by modifying the deity의 statistics, that has the following characteristics.

신성 Rank: 화신의 신성 rank is half that of the deity (round down). This decrease in 신성 rank affects many of the 화신의 statistics and 능력, including 보너스 to 명중 굴림, 피해, 내성 굴림, checks, and 방어도, 피해 축소, 저항, number of 특화 신성 능력 and 보너스 특화 신성 능력, uses per day of domain powers, 내성 굴림 DCs against 유사주문 능력, 거리 of senses, automatic actions, 마법 아이템 it can create, and extent of 신성 aura. The deity의 능력 점수, 속도, 직업 레벨, and 히트 다이스 are unchanged.

신성 능력: 화신 has 특화 신성 능력 according to its own 신성 rank. The deity chooses which of its 능력 화신 has when creating 화신. 화신 cannot have a salient 신성 ability that is not available to a deity of its own rank,

nor can it use a salient 신성 ability if it doesn’t meet 전제조건. An 화신 cannot have 화신 or 정신 소유 특화 신성 능력.

An 화신 does not have any remote sensing or remote communication powers.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

파멸격

Banestrike

전제조건: 기본 공격 보너스 +20.

이익: Any weapon the deity weilds gains 보너스 of +4 on 명중 굴림, and it deals an extra +4d6 points of 피해 against the designated foe. 보너스 and extra 피해 stack with any other properties the weapon has.

Notes: The deity selects one kind of enemy from the list below.

Aberrations 늪괴물
Animals Outsiders, chaotic
Beasts Outsiders, evil
Constructs Outsiders, good
드래곤 Outsiders, lawful
정령 Plants
Fey Undead
거인 Vermin
Monstrous humanoids Humanoids (choose one subtype)

The ability functions only when the deity personally 공격 with a 근접 무기 or 원거리 무기. The deity can apply 파멸격 ability to any weapon or natural weapon, but not to a spell, 유사주문 ability, supernatural ability, or 신성 ability.

A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different kind of foe each time. The deity can imbue only one 파멸 special ability to a weapon at a time and can change among them once a round as a free action.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Death, justice, vengeance, war.

전투감각

Battlesense

이익: The deity cannot be surprised or flanked except by a deity of higher rank. The deity retains its 민첩 보너스 to 방어도 even if caught flat-footed or attacked by an invisible opponent, and is not subject to 은밀한 공격 except by deities of higher rank.

Notes: If the deity has the 기묘한 회피 or 향상된 기묘한 회피 class feature, this ability replaces it.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: War.

생명체 소환

Call Creatures

이익: The kind of creature the deity can call is noted in the deity의 묘사. Each creature called can have no more 히트 다이스 than the deity has 신성 등급, and the deity cannot have more creatures serving it at any given time than the deity has ranks. The creatures are transported to the deity의 presence through an interdimensional connection similar to that created by a 관문 spell, except that it opens to 물질 세계. The creatures willingly serve to the best of their ability. The calling effect is otherwise similar

to the calling property of the 관문 spell.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different kind of creature each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

맑은 시야

Clearsight

전제조건: 신성 rank 6, Wis 29.

이익: The deity can see 환영술, transmuted creatures and objects, and disguised creatures or objects for what they really are, provided they are within 10 feet per 신성 rank of the deity. This ability is similar to the 진실의 시야 spell, except that it does not reveal creatures’ 성향 and it does foil mundane 변장.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 지식, truth.

식물 명령

Command Plants

이익: The deity can make plants grow in a radius of up to one mile per 신성 rank once per day. The deity can use this ability even in a place where no plants grow, though in this case the plants wither and die after one day. This ability works like the 식물 성장 spell, except that it cannot be countered except by a deity of higher rank than the deity using the ability.

Also once per day, the deity can charm plant creatures, 살아 움직이는 식물, or make them 휘감기 its foes. This ability functions like the 식물 명령 spell, except that its maximum 지속시간 is one day no matter which option the deity chooses. At any one time, the deity can charm a number of plant creatures equal to its 신성 rank with this ability, regardless of 히트 다이스.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Agriculture, earth, fertility.

생명체 조종

Control Creatures

이익: The deity can 명령 some kind of creature as noted in the deity의 묘사. This ability is similar to the 몬스터 지배 spell, but it is not a 정신영향계 ability (the deity seizes direct control over the creature의 body). Each day the deity can attempt to control a number of creature equal to its 신성 rank. The deity can attempt to take control of that number all at once, or in smaller numbers. All creatures to

be affected must be within the deity의 line of sight when first affected. Once control is established, distance is not a factor and the deity can maintain control remotely, even across 이세계 and through wards or barriers (except 신성 방패 and warding 주문 cast by deities of higher rank than the deity using the ability). The subject is allowed a Will save (DC 10 + the deity의 rank + the deity의 매력 수정치) to resist and is allowed a

new save if the deity 명령 the subject to do something against its nature.

At any given time, the deity cannot have more creatures under its control than 10 times its 신성 rank. If the deity already has the maximum number of creatures under its control, it can still attempt to take control of other creatures, but must first release

one or more creatures already under its control.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different kind of creature each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

유물 제작

Craft Artifact

전제조건: 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작, 마법봉 제작, 마법지팡이 제작, 마법막대 제작, 고급 아이템 제작, 반지 제작, 마법두루마리 제작.

이익: The deity can 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작, 마법지팡이, 마법막대, 고급 아이템, 반지, and 두루마리 that exceed the normal limits for such items

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 제작, 지식, magic.

물체 생성

Create Object

전제조건: 신성 rank 6, Int 29.

이익: As a full-round action, the deity can create one or more simple, nonmagical objects with a total weight of up to 50 pounds per 신성 rank, or with a total volume of 10 cubic feet per rank. If the deity uses this ability on a divinely morphic plane or within its own godly realm, double the volume and weight the deity can create. If the deity의 realm is located on a divinely morphic plane, triple the volume and weight the deity can create there.

Notes: For 목적 of this ability, a simple object can have no moving parts more complex than a door hinge and must be composed of a single material. The material can be no more valuable than iron (1 sp per pound). Once created, the objects are permanent and nonmagical. If the deity has the appropriate 제작 skill, the deity can make a 제작

check when creating the item to make it a 명품 item.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 제작, creation.

상급 물체 생성

Create Greater Object

전제조건: 신성 rank 11, Int 29, 물체 생성 salient 신성 ability.

이익: As a full-round action, the deity can 물체 생성 weighing up to 100 pounds per 신성 rank, or with a volume of 20 cubic feet per rank. If the deity uses this ability on a divinely morphic plane or within its own godly realm, double the volume and

weight the deity can create. If the deity의 realm is located on a divinely morphic plane, triple the volume and weight the deity can create there.

Notes: This ability works like 물체 생성 ability, except as noted below. A deity can use this ability to create any kind of nonmagical object.

Rest: The deity must convert a considerable amount of its own energy into the object, which can leave the deity impaired. The deity can create an object with a value of up to 100 gp without impairment. For every additional 100 gp of value (or fraction of 100

gp), the deity must rest for 10 minutes. If the deity is creating an item on a divinely morphic plane or within its own godly realm, it can create a 200 gp item without resting. If the deity의 realm is located on a divinely morphic plane, it can create a 300 gp item

there without having to rest.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 제작, creation.

신성 공기 마스터

Divine Air Mastery

전제조건: 공기 계열.

이익: The deity gains a 적성 보너스 on 명중 굴림, 피해, and 방어도 equal to its 신성 rank if both the deity and its foe are airborne. The deity can 비행 with perfect maneuverability. When flying, the deity can automatically know the location of

any corporeal creature within 10 feet per 신성 rank, by sensing the disturbance in the air the creature causes.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Air, wind.

신성 궁술

Divine Archery

전제조건: 기본 공격 보너스 +20, Dex 29, 영점 사격, 원거리 사격.

이익: The deity can fire a 원거리 무기 at any target within line of sight and within 거리 of the deity의 personal senses. No 거리 increment applies to 공격. The deity does not incur any 기회 공격 for firing a bow when threatened. As a full-round action, the deity may fire an arrow at her full 기본 공격 보너스 at each opponent within 10 feet per 신성 rank. The deity must have 무기 집중 feat with the type of bow she uses to 공연 this 공격. When shooting a 원거리 무기, the deity can ignore any 엄폐 보너스 to the target의 AC or any miss chance conferred by the

target의 은폐.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Archers, war.

신성 갑옷 마스터

Divine Armor Mastery

전제조건: 갑옷 숙련(가벼움), 갑옷 숙련(medium).

이익: The deity ignores the maximum 민첩 보너스 limit for medium or 경량 갑옷.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: War.

신성 음유시인

Divine Bard

전제조건: 음유시인 레벨 20th.

이익: This ability has several 이익:

• For the deity의 bardic 능력 that have a 거리(countersong, fascinate, inspire 적성, inspire greatness), that 거리 is a number of miles equal to the deity의 신성 rank.

• The deity can use any bardic music inspiration ability as a standard action. The inspiration takes effect immediately after the deity concludes the action.

• The deity의 bardic music 능력 can affect even those normally immune to 정신영향계 effects. However, such creatures gain a +10 보너스 on their Will 내성 굴림 to resist such effects.

• The effects of all the deity의 bardic music 능력 are doubled. Inspire courage grants a +8 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 against charm and 공포 effects and a +8 의욕 보너스 on 공격 and 피해 rolls; inspire 적성 grants a +4 적성 보너스 on 스킬 판정; inspire greatness grants +4d10 히트 다이스, a +4 적성 보너스 on 명중 굴림, and a +2 적성 보너스 on Fortitude 내성 굴림, and inspire heroics grants a +8 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 and a +8 회피 보너스 to AC. The number of allies the deity can affect with inspire 적성, inspire greatness, and inspire heroics doubles. When inspiring 적성 in multiple allies, the deity can choose different 스킬 to inspire for different allies.

• The effects of the deity의 bardic music inspiration 능력 last for ten times as long as normal after the deity stops singing. This has no effect on inspiration 능력 that have no 지속시간 after 음유시인 stops singing.

• When any effect that is subject to countersong (any spell, supernatural ability, or 유사주문 effect that has the sonic or language-dependent desriptor) occurs within the deity의 hearing, the deity can attempt a countersong as if it had prepared an action to do so.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Art, 음유시인, beauty, dance, love, music, poetry.

신성 전투 마스터

Divine Battle Mastery

전제조건: 전사 레벨 20th, 전투 반사, Int 13, Dex 13, 회피, Expertise, 기동성, 탄성 공격, 훨윈드 공격, 전쟁 계열.

이익: The deity can make an unlimited number of 기회 공격 in one round. (The deity still can’t make more than one 공격 of opportunity against a single opponent in a round.) As a full-round action, the deity may make one melee 공격 at its full 기본 공격 보너스 against each opponent within reach. The deity does not incur any 기회 공격 from this action.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Justice, vengeance, war.

신성 폭발

Divine Blast

전제조건: Cha 29.

이익: The deity can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + its 매력 보너스. The ray created can extend up to one mile per rank (the deity chooses the length). Targets the ray strikes take 1d12 points of 피해 per rank of the deity, plus 1d12

points of 피해 per point of 매력 보너스 the deity has. There is no 내성 굴림, but the deity must make a ranged touch 공격 to hit a target. The deity can make the ray look, sound, smell, and feel like any-thing it desires. Despite the appearance of the ray,

피해 it deals results directly from 신의 권능 and is therefore not subject to being reduced by protection from elements and similar magic.

Notes: The ray destroys a 힘의 장벽, 무지갯빛 벽, or 무지갯빛의 구 it hits (all layers in a prismatic effect are destroyed). The ray itself is unaffected and can strike a target behind the 힘의 장벽 or prismatic effect.

A 신성 방패 can stop the ray.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Death, 파괴, war.

신성 축복

Divine Blessing

전제조건: Selected ability score 40.

이익: Choose one ability: 근력, 민첩, 건강, 지능, 지혜, or 매력. The deity must have a score of at least 40 in the selected ability. The deity can grant mortals a +6 enhancement 보너스 to that ability that lasts for one day. In a single day and at one time, the deity can affect a number of creatures equal to its 신성 rank.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different ability score each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Agility, beauty, 지구력, 지식, 근력, 지혜.

신성 기민함

Divine Celerity

전제조건: Dex 29.

이익: The deity acts as if hasted for a number of minutes per day equal to its 신성 rank. 지속시간 of the effect need not be consecutive rounds. Activating this ability is a free action.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Travel, wind.

신성 제작

Divine Creation

전제조건: 신성 rank 16, Int 29, 물체 생성 salient 신성 ability, 상급 물체 생성 salient 신성 ability.

이익: As a full-round action, the deity can create mortal creatures or 마법 아이템 whose total weight is up to 100 pounds per 신성 rank, or with a total volume of 20 cubic feet per rank. If the deity uses this ability on a divinely morphic plane or within its

own godly realm, double the volume and weight the deity can create. If the deity의 realm is located on a divinely morphic plane, triple the volume and weight the deity can create there.

Notes: This ability works like 상급 물체 생성 ability, except as noted below.

A deity can use this ability to create any kind of creature that does not have a 신성 rank. The deity can create a creature with 직업 레벨, but never with more 직업 레벨 than the deity has itself or the deity의 신성 rank, whichever is lower.

Rest: The deity must convert a considerable amount of its own energy into a creature, which always leaves the deity impaired. The deity must rest for 10 minutes ×the creature의 히트 다이스 ×the creature의 도전 지수 for each creature created, with a minimum of 10 minutes per creature. If the creature has 직업 레벨, each 레벨 counts as an additional Hit Die.

The deity can create any kind of magic item except an artifact.

The rest requirement for 마법 아이템 제작 is the same as for 상급 물체 생성 ability.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 제작, creation, supreme.

신성 회피

Divine Dodge

전제조건: Dex 29.

이익: Any physical 공격 or individually targeted spell directed at the deity has a percent miss chance equal to 50 + the deity의 rank. 범위 effects that include the deity have a similar chance to be ineffective.

Notes: The ability is similar to the 깜빡임 spell, except that it is defensive only and the deity does not 이동 to 에테리얼 세계, but simply exits from reality for a brief moment. This ability never interferes with the deity의 own 공격. If an 공격 overcomes the miss chance, the deity still gets the benefit of a 내성 굴림(if one is allowed).

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Agility, gambling, luck, protection.

신성 드루이드

Divine Druid

전제조건: 드루이드 레벨 20th.

이익: While in a wild shape, the deity gains all the extraordinary and supernatural 능력 of the creature whose form it adopts. In addition to animal forms, the deity can take the form of magical beasts or plant creatures. Some deities can assume additional forms. These are specified in the deity의 묘사.

The deity can assume the form of any animal, magical beast, or plant creature from Fine to Colossal in size.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Nature.

신성 땅 마스터

Divine Earth Mastery

전제조건: 땅 계열.

이익: The deity gains a 적성 보너스 on 명중 굴림, 피해, and 방어도 equal to its 신성 rank if both the deity and its foe are touching the ground. The deity gains a burrow 속도 commensurate with its size (see 신성 특징), as well as the ability to glide through stone, dirt, or almost any other sort of earth except metal as easily as a fish 수영 through water. This burrowing leaves behind no tunnel or hole, nor does it create any ripple or other signs of its presence. The deity has 열감지, allowing it to automatically sense the location of anything within 10 feet per 신성 rank that is in contact with the ground. The deity has complete control over all things made of earth (including stone and metal). It can alter the form of any amount of earth as a free action. The deity can duplicate the effects of the 암석 조형, 지형 조정, 부식의 손아귀, 바위를 진흙으로 변성, 진흙을 바위로 변성, and 분해 주문, with any earth, stone, or metal object as a target. The deity can also transmute any object made of earth,

stone, or metal into a different kind of earth, stone, or metal. The deity can affect any object it can see, but no more than one object per round.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Earth.

신성 빠른 치료

Divine Fast Healing

전제조건: Con 29 or 빠른 치료 special quality.

이익: The deity gains 빠른 치료 of 20 + 신성 rank. Lost limbs or body parts reattach instantly when pressed against the wound on the body.

Notes: This ability does not stack with 빠른 치료 special quality.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, and its effects stack. A deity with two applications of this ability improves its 빠른 치료 by 40 + (신성 rank ×2).

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 지구력, 치료.

신성 불 마스터

Divine Fire Mastery

전제조건: 불 계열.

이익: The deity gains a 적성 보너스 on 명중 굴림, 피해, and 방어도 equal to its 신성 rank if both the deity and its foe are touching fire or using 무기 with the flaming or flaming 폭발 특수 능력.

The deity is immune to the effects of fire and heat.

The deity can automatically know the location of any corporeal creature within 10 feet per 신성 rank by sensing the disturbance in the ambient temperature that the creature causes.

The deity has complete control over all nonmagical fire and can duplicate the effect of any spell with the fire descriptor as a standard action.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Fire.

신성 입심

Divine Glibness

전제조건: Cha 29, 허세 40 ranks, 속임수 계열.

이익: As a full-round action, the deity can 말하기 and convince others to take some course of action. This works like a 광역 제안 spell cast at a 레벨 equal to 10 + the deity의 신성 rank, except that it affects up to (10 + 신성 rank) creatures, no two of

which can be more than (10 ×신성 rank) feet apart. The save DC is 10 + the deity의 매력 수정치 + the deity의 신성 rank.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Commerce, lies, thieves.

신성 영감

Divine Inspiration

이익: The deity can enchant creatures to create a specific emotion. The deity can affect one creature per 신성 rank at once, and up to the same number each day. All must be within the deity의 line of sight when first affected. The specific effects depend on the

emotional state induced.

Courage: The enchanted creatures become immune to 공포 effects and receive a +2 의욕 보너스 on 명중 굴림, weapon 피해 rolls, 스킬 판정, and Will 내성 굴림.

Despair: The enchanted creatures are affected as by an improved version of the 짓누르는 절망 spell: affected creatures suffer a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림, 피해 rolls, 내성 굴림, and checksunless they make a successful Will save (DC 10 + deity의 매력 수정치 + deity의 신성 rank). The effect lasts one day.

Dread: The enchanted creatures must make successful 지혜 checks (DC = the deity의 신성 rank) to 공격 or fight. If the check fails, the creature flees in panic for 1d4 rounds. If the check succeeds, the creature does not have to check again for

10 minutes. The enchanted creatures also suffer a –2 morale 페널티 on 명중 굴림, weapon 피해 rolls, 스킬 판정, and Will 내성 굴림.

Frenzy: Frenzied creatures spend themselves in drinking, feasting, and dancing unless provoked or incited to violence. Frenzied creatures turn violent if they are attacked or perceive a threat to their safety. Frenzied creatures receive a +4 의욕 보너스 to 근력 and 민첩, a –4 페널티 to 지혜, and a –2 페널티 to AC. Subjects can attempt Will 내성 굴림(DC 10 + deity의 매력 수정치 + deity의 신성 rank) to resist the effect. This is a 정신영향계 충동.

Hope: The enchanted creatures gain a +4 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림, 명중 굴림, 능력 판정, 스킬 판정, and weapon 피해 rolls.

격노: The enchanted creatures receive a +4 의욕 보너스 to 근력 and 건강 scores, a +2 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림, and a –2 페널티 to AC. They are compelled to fight heedless of danger. Subjects can attempt Will 내성 굴림(DC 10 + deity의 매력

수정치 + deity의 신성 rank) to resist the effect. This is a 정신영향계 충동.

Love and Desire: A love effect causes the target to fall in love with the specified creature, seeking every opportunity to be near that creature and making every effort to win the creature의 affection. A desire effect is similar, but the target seeks any opportunity to

become physically intimate with the specified creature. Subjects can attempt Will 내성 굴림(DC 10 + deity의 매력 수정치 + deity의 신성 rank) to resist the effect. This is a 정신영향계 충동 effect.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Any.

신성 수도사

Divine Monk

전제조건: 수도사 레벨 20th.

이익: The deity의 비무장 공격 are treated as a magic slashing weapon with an enhancement 보너스 of +5 and the keen, lawful, and vorpal qualities. If the deity chooses, a particular 공격 can be bludgeoning instead of slashing, but the keen and vorpal qualities do not apply to that 공격. Any unarmed 공격 the deity makes has a base 피해 of 2d12.

The deity can use 화살 쳐내기 feat to deflect any ranged 공격(including 주문 that require ranged touch 공격) as if they were arrows. The deity can deflect any number of 공격 in a single round. When the deity deflects any 공격, 공격 is reflected upon the attacker, using the deity의 base ranged 공격 보너스. When the deity deflects a spell, the spell의 레벨 is added to the DC to deflect 공격.  The deity only gains the second benefit of this ability if he or she has 화살 쳐내기 feat.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Law.

신성 성기사

Divine Paladin

전제조건: 성기사 레벨 20th.

이익: The deity의 용기의 오라 grants a +8 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 against 공포 effects and extends to all allies within 100 feet of the deity.

The deity의 special 탈것, if any, gains the celestial template.

The deity can 악 처벌 ten times per day, and gets an extra 3 points of 피해 per 직업 레벨 on a successful smite attempt.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Good, justice, law, nobility, war.

신성 광휘

Divine Radiance

전제조건: Good 성향, 태양 계열.

이익: The deity can shed 빛 in a (10 feet ×신성 rank) emanation from its body. This 빛 counters and dispels all 암흑 effects (unless created by a deity of higher rank) and causes pain and 피해 to undead creatures, who take 2d8 points of 피해 per round with no save. As a 전력 공격 action, the deity can generate up to three 광선 of scorching 빛 that can strike targets up to a number of miles away equal to the deity의 신성 rank. Each ray deals 1d6 points of 피해 per 2 신성 등급. Undead take 1d12 points of 피해 per 2 신성 등급.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Good, 빛, sun.

신성 격노

Divine Rage

전제조건: 바바리안 레벨 20th.

이익: This ability is similar to 바바리안의 격노 ability (and it replaces 바바리안 격노 ability for the deity). The deity can activate this ability only after suffering 피해 from a weapon, and can use it a number of times per day equal to its 신성 rank. Once used, the ability lasts 1 hour (though the deity can end the 격노 at will). While raging, the deity gains +10 to 근력, +10 to 건강, and a +5 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림. The deity의 주문 저항 and 에너지 저항 each increase by +10. The deity also can make one extra 공격, at its full 공격 보너스, whenever it uses 전력 공격 action. While raging, the deity suffers a –5 페널티 to 방어도 and cannot 공연 acts that require patience and 집중, such as moving silently, 주문 시전하기, and using 특화 신성 능력.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 파괴, 격노, 근력, war.

신성 레인저

Divine Ranger

전제조건: 레인저 레벨 20th, Wis 25, 야생 Lore 40 ranks, 지식(nature) 30 ranks.

이익: Any weapon the deity wields against one of its favored enemies is treated as a 파멸 weapon against that creature type. Thus, its enhancement 보너스 is increased by +2 and it deals +2d6 points of 피해.

The deity can follow 추적 at its normal land 속도. It treats all normal terrain as 아주 부드러운 지면 for 목적 of tracking and ignores DC 수정치 for time or 날씨. The deity can 추적 creatures across water, underwater, or through the air by means of the minute disturbances they make and traces of their passage. Surface DC
Across water 60

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Archers, hunting, nature.

신성 회상

Divine Recall

이익: The deity remembers every event of a certain type that has ever occurred. The type of event is specified in the deity 묘사.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different type of event each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: 지식.

신성 도적

Divine Rogue

전제조건: 도적 레벨 20th, 회피, 향상된 회피, 방어적 구르기.

이익: When struck by an 공격 from an opponent the deity has designated as its 회피 target, the deity may make a Reflex save (DC 10 + 피해 dealt) to negate all 피해 from 공격.

If the deity passes within 5 feet of a trap, the deity is entitled to a 탐색 check to notice it as if the deity were actively looking for it.

The deity can assess the exact value of any 전리품 it can see.

The deity also can immediately determine what any creature is carrying and where each carried item is.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Thieves.

신성 방패

Divine Shield

전제조건: Cha 29.

이익: As a free action, the deity can create a 방패 that lasts 10 minutes and protects the deity의 body and 장비 from 공격. 방패 stops 10 points of 피해 per rank. Once 방패 stops that much 피해, it collapses. The 피해 can be from any source, including a 신성 폭발 공격. The deity can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + its 건강 보너스.

Notes: The deity can adjust 방패 so that it does not block 피해 the deity ignores anyway. The effects of multiple 신성 방패 do not stack.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Protection.

신성 스킬 집중

Divine Skill Focus

전제조건: 23 ranks in the selected skill.

이익: The deity receives 보너스 of 10 + its 신성 rank when using the skill selected.

Notes: This 보너스 stacks with 신성 rank 보너스 deities normally receive on checks. If the selected skill is related to the deity의 portfolio, add the deity의 rank to the maximum DC for a free action.

A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different skill each time.

신성 은밀한 공격

Divine Sneak Attack

The deity can flank or catch flat-footed any opponent whose 신성 rank does not exceed the deity의 and can 은밀한 공격 that opponent. The deity cannot deal 은밀한 공격 피해 to opponents that are immune to critical hits. Any time the deity inflicts 피해 with a 은밀한 공격, that target suffers 피해 equal to the deity의 은밀한 공격 보너스

피해 on the deity의 next turn as well.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Thieves.

신성 주문 집중

Divine Spell Focus

전제조건: 주문 집중, 상급 주문 집중.

이익: The deity chooses one 학파 of magic. The save DC for any spell of that 학파 increases by one-half the deity의 신성 rank. This 보너스 overlaps (does not stack with) 보너스 from 주문 집중 or 상급 주문 집중.

Notes: A deity can have this ability multiple times, choosing a different 학파 of magic each time.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Magic.

신성 주문시전

Divine Spellcasting

전제조건: Spellcaster 레벨 20th.

이익: The deity can cast 주문 whose effective 레벨 is above 9th. The number of 주문 per day the deity can cast of each spell 레벨 above 9th depends on the deity의 핵심 능력 score for spell-casting classes in which the deity has achieved 20th 레벨, as shown

on 표: 신성 주문시전. The numbers on that table represent one spell per day at each spell 레벨 above 9th in which it receives 보너스 주문 from its 핵심 능력 score, plus

보너스 주문 based on 핵심 능력 score. The deity can use these slots for 주문 prepared or cast with a 메타마법 feat, or for lower-레벨 주문.

If the deity has achieved 20th 레벨 in a spellcasting class with fewer than nine 레벨 of 주문(such as 음유시인, 성기사, or 레인저), the deity can also cast one spell per day of each 레벨 between the maximum normal spell 레벨 and 9th, plus appropriate 보너스 주문

of each 레벨 based on the deity의 핵심 능력 score. These 주문 are not shown on the table.

The deity also doesn’t incur 기회 공격 for 주문 시전하기 when threatened.

In addition, the deity receives the benefit of 주문 집중 feat on any spell it casts.

Suggested Portfolio Elements: Magic.

FEATS

전제조건: 주문 시간 연장.

이익: A 지속성 주문 has a 지속시간 of 24 hours. 지속성 주문 must have a personal 거리 or a fixed 거리. 주문 of instantaneous 지속시간 cannot be affected by this feat, nor can 주문 whose effects are discharged.  You need not concentrate on 주문 such as 마법 감지 or 생각 감지 to be aware of the mere presence of absence of the things detected, but you must still concentrate to gain additional information as normal.  집중 on such a spell is a standard action that does not provoke an 공격 of opportunity.  A 지속성 주문 uses up a spell slot six 레벨 higher than the spell의 actual 레벨.

이익: When using the weapon you selected, you gain a +4 보너스 on the roll to confirm a threat.

REPEAT SPELL [METAMAGIC]

전제조건: Any other 메타마법 feat.

이익: A repeated spell is automatically cast again at the beginning of your next round of actions. No matter where you are, the secondary spell originates from the same location and affects the same 범위 as the primary spell. If the repeated spell

A repeated spell uses up a spell slot three 레벨 higher than the spell의 actual 레벨. 주문 반복 cannot be used on 주문 with a 거리 of touch.
